hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_AUTOMATICS_ORCHESTRATION
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to build the .war file and Docker image of Automatics Orchestration

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_GIT_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the URL of Automatics Git repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_GIT_BRANCH_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Branch Name of Automatics Git repository

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: AUTOMATICS_GIT_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials for Automatics Git Login

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_AUTOMATICS_PROPERTIES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to build the .war file and Docker image of Automatics Properties

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPERTIES_GIT_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the URL of Automatics Properties Git repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPERTIES_GIT_BRANCH_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Branch Name of Automatics Properties Git repository

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPERTIES_GIT_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials for Automatics Properties Git Login

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_DEVICE_MANAGER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to build the .war file and Docker image of Device Manager

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_GIT_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the URL of Device Manager Git repository

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_GIT_BRANCH_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Branch Name of Device Manager Git repository

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_GIT_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials for Device Manager Git Login
